text: 4.22 Lom 6.6, 8.13, Epe 2.2-3, 4.17, Kol 3.9, Hib 12.1, 1 Pi 4.3 Ned nɨbi gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨgun agɨl nɨgelɨgɨpɨm ak, tap anɨb ak nɨbop gek, chɨbol nɨbop tɨkjakek, tap yokɨp okok gɨl gɨ tɨmel gelɨgɨpɨm. Gem ameb, tap tɨmel anɨb okok, nɨbop pɨsnep gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨg gak. Mɨñɨl pen tap tɨmel anɨb okok kelɨgɨl, bɨ kɨli chech tɨmel gup ak dɨyokɨpal tek dɨyokɨnɨmɨb.
